special_text:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a loyalty counter on The Archivist.
[+1]: Surveil 1, then investigate.
[-1]: Fateseal 1. [i](Look at the top card of an opponent's library, then you may put it on the bottom of that player's library.)[/i]
[-8]: You get an emblem with “You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.”
